author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: مظلومیّته الّتی احترقت بها افئدة المقرّبین مع آنکه ببلایای لایحصی در دست اعدا مبتلا جمیع رؤسای ارض را واحداً بعد واحد تبلیغ نمودیم آنچه را که ارادة الله بآن تعلّق یافته بود لیعلموا الأمم
translation: Though afflicted with countless tribulations, which We have suffered at the hands of Our enemies, We have proclaimed unto all the rulers of the earth what God hath willed to proclaim, that all nations may know that no manner of affliction can deter the Pen of the Ancient of Days from achieving its purpose. His Pen moveth by the leave of God, Who fashioneth the crumbling and rotten bones.
